title: In Midwest, Bitterly Cold Temps Keep Students At Home
teaser: In Chicago, a city that relishes their ability to deal with the harsh realities of winter the cold weather forced the closing of its schools on Wednesday. While classes were cancelled in over 100 districts, buildings were open to accept students who had nowhere to go and could not stay home alone.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
